title: DSWO Thanjavur Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Accounts Assistant Post
description: The District Social Welfare Office (DSWO) Thanjavur has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Accounts Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in a Diploma or any Degree can grab this chance and apply for the DSWO Thanjavur Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply on or before the last...
